title: Conqueror = drain tank....
body: But meanwhile, ravenous hunter has healed me 6k in one game while conqueror 1k...

replies.body:
conquerer heals for 15% of all damage inflicted - after building up 10 stacks.

ravenous hunter heals 1.5-14% of all damage always - as long as it's a skill.

it's obviously very easy to imagine different situations where one heals more than the other.
Runes shouldn't heal like that in the first place...
Great opinion. Has there been some sort of established premise that you're comparing it to?
Yeah, when vlad/aatrox get outhealed by RH/conq users it kinda soils their design-space.
RH will always win. you just gotta get assist or kills and done. you have that healing the entire time and not for the moment.
RH also has a AOE penalty on it. Conq doesn't. So for single target, RH wins. In AOE, Conq wins.

> [{quoted}](name=RandomYuki,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ptj3Vqup,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2020-01-14T03:15:50.551+0000)
>
> RH will ALWAYS win as long as you make sure to satisfy certain prerequisites first

Do you read over what you type before hitting 'post'?

Plenty of champions have kits and playstyles in which RH is weaker than conquerer.

divers who only commit to fights and don't or can't poke will find conquerer healing more.

split pushers who don't participate in fights and might not ever get full stacks will find conquerer better.

any auto attack reliant champion will find conquerer better
i don't care about which champions can take it. Overall ravenous hunter will always heal more.  Why did you change what I typed?

Don't worry, what you actually said and what I changed it to have the exact same meaning - andthey're both false.

"Overall" and "always" are also logically inconsistent.

But I get the feeling you're indignant and refuse to change what your initial opinion is no matter how factually, logically, provably wrong it is.

The lack of real discussion you're open to means that this whole thread is one big rant and should just be deleted for spam.

But you keep thinking that ravenous Hunter is always sometimes potentially inevitably better than conquerer maybe
Bizarre edge cases do not equate to balance considerations.
